attributes.action: support the ESA's Mars rover program.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Space exploration has inevitably lead to or hastened the development of countless useful technologies we use in our daily lives -- the teflon for non-stick frying pans, the integrated circuits which make up our computers, and (bizarrely) the image processing software used in the development of anti-wrinkle creams. The continuing exploration of Mars only helps drive scientific advances further forward, as well as being an exciting opportunity to find out more about this solar system we live in.
